metadata.name: Serenity
metadata.description:
Serenity

“Serenity” is part of “The Empirical World” collection.  
A digital journey in which the exploration of a new world and the contact with it leads to a direct exploration of oneself and of different sensations and conditions of human nature.  
An investigation of the relationship between experience and sensation. 

Token info:  
ERC721  
Contract made with Manifold Studio 

Image:  
Size 3240 × 5760 pixels

 How the work was made:  
Made in Blender 3D + Cycles + post processing in Photoshop.

Subject: modeled with meshes + sculpting tools in Blender  
Fog: principled volume + additional procedural nodes.  
Rocks: made with meshes + sculpting tools: 
for the rock material I have used a Poly Haven texture modified in Photoshop according to the type of environment that I wanted to create.  
Water: procedural nodes.
